WordsBankItems.Name: make up
WordsBankItems.Body:
составлять что либо, например 

Our family us made up of those who dedicated themselves to God and who execrise faith in the ransom sacrifice of his Son.


to be made up of

WordsBankItems.Name: enjoy
WordsBankItems.Body:
We enjoy something - мы наслаждаемся чем то.

We enjoy a meaningful life now.
Мы наслаждаемся осмысленной жизнью

WordsBankItems.Name: rejoice
WordsBankItems.Body: We rejoice in the prospect of life without end.

WordsBankItems.Name: by means of something
WordsBankItems.Body:
By means of the ransom, Jehovah made it possible for us to have a warm relationship with him.

- by using a thing

WordsBankItems.Name: concern
WordsBankItems.Body: They are concerned about the temple because Jesus has already foretold that not a stone of it will be not left upon a stone.

WordsBankItems.Name: just
WordsBankItems.Body: he just said about the temple
